hints.content:
To find how many monkeys Javier saw $\goldE{\text{Last Saturday}}$, we start with the number of monkey's Javier saw $\blueE{\text{today}}$ and add $\maroonD{3\text{ monkeys}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/a9e7054bfdfe29b97b826ec6e7cb647db2919cde)

$\blueE{16} + \maroonD{3} = \goldE{\Box}$

Let's add to find how many monkey's Javier saw $\goldE{\text{Last Saturday}}$.

![](web+graphie://cdn.kastatic.org/ka-perseus-graphie/82ab5b2acbd278388513af74dd9cfa9e75d8735c)

$\blueE{16} + \maroonD{3} = \goldE{19}$

question.content:
Javier went to the zoo today and saw $16$ monkeys. That is $3$ fewer than he saw last Saturday. 

**How many monkeys did Javier see last Saturday?**  

[[â˜ƒ input-number 1]] monkeys
